com.blogspot.technicalmiracle

Class SceneAnimationFragment.FlingMotionView

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.blogspot.technicalmiracle.SceneAnimationFragment.FlingMotionView
  • Enclosing class:
    SceneAnimationFragment

    class SceneAnimationFragment.FlingMotionView
extends java.lang.Object
    An Animation class to handle the OnFling motion event.

    The class uses Android ImageView subclasses to draw multiple graphics objects. Tracking shapes and generated text's labels.
